name: roundup
description: Roundup is a self-hosted issue tracker with a flexible schema, email support, and web-based interface for managing tasks and issues in software or business workflows.

features.title: Email Integration
features.description: Create or update issues by sending emails to the tracker

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Access and manage issues through a browser-based UI

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find issues using powerful queries across all fields

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload documents, screenshots, or logs to issues

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Control access with roles and permissions for different team members
